title: Meishu: travels in Chinese art. Part 1
brief_description: Canal boat to history Part 1 of a 3 part series travelling through China in search of the essence of Chinese art. This episode explores the problem of communication caused by China’s vast size and diversity of landscape and shows how this has been reflected in Chinese art through the ages.
